resources.string: This software is help people need to dial a number that has prefix. When using this software, dial will have choice to useing prefix or not. And you can configure your specific prefix under the following input column. PS: The special number like WAIT, WILD, PAUSE are different to different phones. Please reference the code of yours:
This is a customize dialer application. You can put a number into the column and press dial to choice your dial method.

How to configure a rule:
 Rule has 2 type: include/exclude, and there are 3 condition can use for filter dial number: start with, end with, include. The rule set for XDialer service will include/exclude the conditions you configured.
 EX: Filter Type = Include, DN Start With = 0953
 Then the XDialer service will only apply to the number start with 0953*.
Service can be default On or Off. If XDialer service On, the original dialer dial action will apply the configured pattern, and vice versa.\n

XDialer provide 3 columns (P,M,L) for configure prefix. And you can use pattern column configure to merge the 3 columns (P,M,L).\n EX: pattern = P,M,L and prefix=23456789, midfix=0, lastfix=3333 and dial a number 0953333333\n Then the XDialer service will append 2345678,0,333 to your dial number like 2345678,0,3330953333333
